title: 15 minute block from dodging 1 ARAM game.
body: i dodge so few games, but I hit play again after an ARAM game and then took a phone call came back and just started the queue. I meant to pick Ranked, but when I saw it was Aram I closed the client to find out a 15 MINUTE block from being able to Queue up. Are you really serious right now riot......... 15 minutes for 1 dodge of ARAM. you guys must be sick in the head. it takes like 5 seconds to find a ARAM game so I am pretty sure that I did not hurt my fellow players too much by dodging that. its not like ranked when you go through all the bans and picks, then dodge. This needs to be fixed cause this is some BS

replies.body: honestly what a joke, maybe riot need to fix the buggyness of their client before implentmenting such a stupidly high counter. i was lobbied up with my friend and it when i "accepted" the game it didnt bring him into it with me. so i dodged thinking yeah okay 5-6 min wait.... but no. instead i get a 16MIN dodge counter. i have had this happen before when the client bugged out and the screen was blacked out when i loaded into the champ select preventing me to re roll of even see whom i was given. roit if youre going to do stupid things like this please fix your client instead of punishing players for you buggy client.
This is why I don't recommend this game to people. Yall are toxic as fuck just from an aram dodge. Sad days from a shit community.

Dude dodging an ARAM is worse than dodging a regular game. Chances are that among the 9 people in the game there were at least a few who were excited to play what they got and now they might have to play a shitload of games to get the same champ again. 15 minutes is a sad excuse of a penalty for an ARAM dodge.

I agree with you.
I never dodge arams cause if you dodge because of the champs then you shouldn't queue for aram at all.
But I just dodged one game because I saw I was paired with a toxic/afk player I just had a game with and I didn't want to go through another game with him so I dodged and I was hella surprised the timer was so long.
15 seems too much, I'd say 5 BUT it MUST retain the champs, that itself should defeat the purpose of people dodging because of bad picks, and in case of premades retain all of them so it's not like one sacrifices for all.
It's to stop people from dodging because they didn't get a S tier aram champ which defeats the entire house of a random mode

so instead it use to be 5 minutes which would have been fine, but 15 for 1 game dodge that is stupid. If I dont want to play an ARAM game then why would I sit in a game for 15+ minutes to play the actual game mode that I wanted to?

My understanding is that it stepped up depending on the frequency at which you dodged. Use to happen to a friend of mine somewhat frequently, when he'd dodge a match so he could play with friends (and as a result we'd all sit around and talk on voice chat while waiting for the timer to go down).
I have not dodged in weeks.

You are right, 15 minutes is wrong.  I would prefer 30 minute or more.  I have gone through chains of dodgers in ARAM that is just getting ridiculous.  So I have no problem with it.  I had something go on real life and had to get up from comp and I got a long q when I came back, and I was perfectly fine with it.

30 minutes for dodging 1 game are you serious. I said I almost never dodge, but I Queued up accidentally and you think that justifies a 30 minute wait. you guys are sick for real and may be in need of serious help. ARAM queue is nothing like going through a normal draft or ranked draft queue all the way only for it to be dodged that is annoying AF and I have had that happen many times, but for someone like me who almost never dodges this is pretty dumb.
